heading: HR00295
0: A RESOLUTION DECLARING THE 14TH OF JUNE OF EVERY YEAR AS A NATIONAL NON-WORKING HOLIDAY TO CELEBRATE THE HEROISM OF THE UNITS OF 121ST USAFIP-NL FORCES IN THEIR BATTLE AT BESSANG PASS AGAINST THE JAPANESE IMPERIAL FORCES UNDER GENERAL TOMOYUKI YAMASHITA
